reviews.text: My daughter, friend and I stayed here in October and would stay there again. Great staff, great room, sleep number bed (which was fun), and nice property. We also loved the staff. Yes the area may be a little run down, but we found it safe and central to everywhere we went. The light rail is up the road, food is around, and a store close by. Oh, the hotel food was great too, which was a pleasant surprise. Only downer was no heated pool and they needed to turn it on when their temp. dropped. The desk clerk Bizzare was the best (yes that's her name). You can't get any nicer with her.
reviews.title: Great Stay
Spring Training in Phoenix
reviews.text: Earlier this year we went to Phoenix to see a Spring training game for the Dodgers. Had a very nice weekend and a great time at the ballgame. The baseball facility is really nice - very new and beautiful. We should have gone to more than one game while we were there but had only planned for one game.

Phoenix was ok but not great. I'm sure there was more to do than we did but since the purpose of our trip was the game, we didn't seek too much out. We ate at Sylvia's La Canasta restaurant which was very overrated. It wasn't bad but it wasn't great either.
reviews.title: Clean and Comfortable-Nice Pool

reviews.text: We stayed at the Radisson City Center which was fine but not great, but for the price there was good value. It's an older hotel but everything was fine.
reviews.title: Hotel has declined in quality; location has become very undesirable

reviews.text: We completely overpaid for a rental car - I think we got it through Avis but all were the same price....something ridiculous. It had to be because of Spring Training that the prices were so high. Not sure what we could have done about that but I should have booked it earlier for sure.
reviews.title: Great Staff!

reviews.text: I stayed at this hotel for five nights, and we had a series of business meetings using the hotel facilities. It was a very good, and very convenient, choice.
reviews.title: Very good choice for a meeting venue in Phoenix. A little tough to find.

reviews.text: Rooms were quiet and comfortable. Our attendees got a very good deal. Service from everyone - banquet staff, front desk, maintenance, and housekeeping - was excellent. Some of the facilities were a little difficult - for example, no indoor restrooms near the meeting rooms and a very small and not terribly convenient restaurant. Food service for the meetings was good, but the variety was a little limited.
reviews.title: Great Staff, But This Hotel Needs a Facelift!

likes.disliked: — Lack of attention to maintenance, not really clean

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Regarding the restaurant, it has limited hours, with no lunch hour. Excellent service, very good food, but very limited variety and selection. There are a number of local options for restaurants, though, particularly if you have a car.
reviews.title: Friendly Staff, Lovely Hotel

likes.liked: — Cleanliness, polite staff, ease of check in/out, free internet access

reviews.text: This location is very convenient. Even in rush hour, it was a short and quick ride to the airport. The location is close to downtown Phoenix, and the commuter rail service is a short walk, if you are so inclined. Parking was adequate, even with a wedding in the hotel during our first night there.
reviews.title: Great place to cool down

reviews.text: Fitness facility was acceptable, and the pool area with some other recreation options is very nice.
reviews.title: Phoenix Weekend April 2008

likes.liked: — The Pool and the Breakfast servers (very nice!)
likes.disliked: — Not up to par for the price paid

reviews.text: standard nicer chain hotel was was new. had a great pool area, too cold to use though.
reviews.title: nice, clean, safe, newer, a bit far from anything to do

likes.liked: — clean, safe, new and a chain
likes.disliked: — too far from stuff to do at night, and they messed up the billing.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: had to take a least a 15 min cab ride to get any where for stuff to do or dinner. lots of places deliver, but took over an hour and a half.
reviews.title: Very disappointing
